home.features_feature1_title: Basado en la experiencia de la vida real

home.header_title: Build modern interfaces with the Gravity design system and libraries
home.banner_content: We are collecting questions for the Markdown editor webinar, please fill out the form!
home.news_items_item1: Icon Library Update: 742 vector icons available for your projects; 51 changes in the release! Figma Library Update: sample interfaces were added to the Branding and Customization page to fast preview the applied theme.
home.news_items_item2: The number of developers involved in the project has already exceeded 250! Thank you each for your contribution, stay with us to make the product even better!
home.news_items_item3: Now you can import your Themer files into Figma Library using the Gravity Themer Plugin!
home.features_feature1_description: Conceived as an in-house solution in response to real developers' needs, we released Gravity to the open-source community.
home.features_feature2_description: Experienced designers curate the look of our libraries, ensuring that components are stylish and consistent, with support for dark mode and high-contrast themes.
home.features_feature3_description: Regular feedback from our community of developers allows us to continuously improve our libraries, and break compatibility only when necessary.
home.roadmap_items_item2: Themer 1.5 Support of theme export to Figma

libraries-info.description_uikit: Base UI components and tokens for building services with Gravity.
libraries-info.description_components: A set of complex React components.
libraries-info.description_icons: Set with hundreds of various modern SVG icons for your projects.
libraries-info.description_illustrations: A set of illustrations for displaying data statuses.
libraries-info.description_dynamic-forms: Library for rendering neat and functional react forms described by JSON schema
libraries-info.description_page-constructor: A set of stylish, functional blocks for quickly creating promo and landing pages.
libraries-info.description_blog-constructor: A library based on the Page constructor library for creating blog-like services.
libraries-info.description_chartkit: A data visualization suite integrated with our design system.
libraries-info.description_dashkit: A grid component for building interactive dashboards.
libraries-info.description_yagr: A high-performance canvas charts renderer, based on uPlot.
libraries-info.description_nodekit: A simple toolkit for your Node.js apps, scripts and libraries.
libraries-info.description_expresskit: Lightweight express.js wrapper that integrates with NodeKit.
libraries-info.description_app-layout: HTML layout generator used in our SPA applications.
libraries-info.description_app-builder: Webpack-based static assets builder used in our SPA applications.
libraries-info.description_navigation: A compact and extensible navigation panel for complex services.
libraries-info.description_date-utils: Helpers for managing Date and Time values.
libraries-info.description_axios-wrapper: Axios wrapper that provides automatic cancelling of concurrent requests.
libraries-info.description_dialog-fields: A react-final-form wrapper that provides some useful high-level components for building forms.
libraries-info.description_react-data-table: A react component for rendering big and complex tables.
libraries-info.description_oauth-clients: Client OAuth library that provides convenient abstraction on top of auth flow.
libraries-info.description_i18n: Internationalization helpers of Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_eslint-config: ESLint configuration preset for Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_tsconfig: TypeScript compiler configuration preset for Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_prettier-config: Prettier configuration preset for Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_stylelint-config: Stylelint configuration preset for Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_babel-preset: Babel configuration preset for Gravity UI projects.
libraries-info.description_browserslist-config: Browserslist confugiration preset used in our services.
libraries-info.description_markdown-editor: A powerful tool for working with Markdown, which combines WYSIWYG and Markup modes.
libraries-info.description_graph: High-performance graph renderer with dynamic scale-aware detailization
libraries-info.description_webpack-i18n-assets-plugin: A plugin for Webpack that replaces calls to localization functions (i18n) with target texts.
libraries-info.description_table: Library for visualizing data in tabular format.
